name: 郭忠義
objective:
在本課程中，同學將學習到計算機程式語言Python基礎與應用，建立Python程式設計的基本概念。透過做中學、學中做，建構程式設計的基礎，以及基本程式運算邏輯，以培養運算思維、動手做的能力。期末以分組方式完成一個與學生專業領域相關應用的專題，學習如何運用程式解決與自身相關領域運用上的問題。
In this course, students will learn the basics and applications of the Python programming language and establish the basic concepts of Python programming design. Through the continuous practice, student will construct the basic logic of the program design, and the ability of computation think and practice application. At the final, a topic related to the application of students' professional subjects will be completed in groups, and student will learn how to use the program to solve problems in the relevant fields.
schedule:
Week 1　　Environment, Data Type, Arithmetic operator, I/O
Week 2　　Top-down design with function
Week 3　　Selection Structures - if,  Comparison and logic operator
Week 4　　Selection Structures: switch and nest if, Quiz#1
Week 5　　Unit Test, function
Week 6　　Loop statement - for
Week 7　　Loop statements - while
Week 8　　List, Nest loop statements, Quiz#2
Week 9　　上機測驗
Week 10　　Dictionary, Set, Zip, Map
Week 11　　String, File I/O, Exception Handling
Week 12　　Data Analysis
Week 13　　Basic Machine Learning Programming
Week 14　　Basic Machine Learning Programming
Week 15　　專題範例I 手寫辨識
Week 16　　專題範例II 臉部情緒辨識
Week 17　　專題範例III 心跳偵測
Week 18　　期末專題報告上機展示
scorePolicy:
1.期中考30%(上機測驗)
2.期末考30%(專題實作成果)
3.平常考核40%(出缺勤、作業、小考)
materials:
Python程式設計從入門到進階應用，黃建庭，全華圖書
Python零基礎入門班，文淵閣工作室
用Python學運算思維，Ana Bell，旗標科技
